subject: Basketball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: To acquire Chris Paul, Los Angeles is sending the Hornets four of its top assets: guard Eric Gordon, forward Al-Farouq Aminu, center Chris Kaman and a 2012 first-round draft pick.
snippet: To acquire Chris Paul, Los Angeles is sending the Hornets four of its top assets: guard Eric Gordon, forward Al-Farouq Aminu, center Chris Kaman and a 2012 first-round draft pick.
